EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Holy Bastion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 Hit Point and 1 Positive Energy Spell Power for each action point you spend in this tree. Each Sacred Defender Core Ability you possess grants +2% Fortification.

Effect.DisplayName: Sacred Defender: Hitpoints per action point
Sacred Defender: Positive spell power per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Defence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +10 Physical and Magical Resistance +50% bonus to threat generation Cannot become raged while Sacred Defence is active

Stance.Name: Sacred Defense
Stance.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +10 Physical and Magical Resistance +50% bonus to threat generation

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Divine Righteousness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: You gain temporary hit points equal your Charisma score and a 200% Sacred bonus to threat generation for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Redemption
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The following spells are added to the Paladin spell list: Level 2: Raise Dead Level 3: Resurrection Level 4: True Resurrection Passive: You gain +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Glorious Stand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Channel Divinity: For a short duration you gain DR 20/Epic, take reduced damage from elemental and negative energy, receive double healing from positive energy, and are immune to secondary effects of attacks such as 'wounding' or 'vorpal'. Passive: You gain +5 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Eternal Defender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +2 Charisma, +2 Constitution, + 10 to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating and your range of unconsciousness extends by 40 hitpoints. Toggle: While Eternal Defender is active, if you drop below 0 hit points but are not killed, two uses of Turn Undead are immediately expended and you receive a reactive heal for 250 points of Positive Energy healing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Extra Lay on Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Lay on Hands use per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Improved Sacred Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Sacred Defense Stance. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Durable Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain +[5/10/15] Sacred bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [50/100/150]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Armor Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Armor Class and Armor Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Saves Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all saving throws for 20 seconds. While under this effect you do not automatically fail saving throws on a roll of a natural 1. (Cooldown: 30 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Instinctive Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take [5/10/15]% less damage when struck while helpless. (Additional damage while helpless varies by difficulty setting from 5% to 25%.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Bulwark Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now grants an additonal +[1/3/5] Armor Class.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Improved Sacred Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one of the options you did not pick at tier 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Durable Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain +[5/10/15] Sacred bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [50/100/150]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Sacred Shield Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5%/+10%/+15% Shield Armor Class and +[1/2/3] Tower Shield Maximum Dexterity Bonus.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Defense Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +[5/10/15] Action Boost bonus to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Resistance Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now grants an additional +[1/2/3] to Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Improved Sacred Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves your Sacred Defense stance. Pick the third option left.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Durable Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain +[5/10/15] Sacred bonus to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inciting Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain [50/100/150]% Sacred bonus to melee threat generation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Resilient Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: When in Sacred Defense, you gain a +[1/2/3] Sacred bonus to all Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +10%/+15%/+20% Sacred bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Reinforced Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves the Armor Class bonuses you receive from shields or armor. Choose one:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Armor
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from armor or docents is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Shield
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from using a shield is increased by [15/30/50]%. Note: The Shield bonus does not stack with the bonus from the Unyielding Sentinel Epic Destiny. Note: This stacks with Reinforced Defense from Stalwart Defender.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Spellshield Aura
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Aura now also grants a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Spell Resistance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Swift Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Sacred Defence increases your movement speed by 10%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Choose one of the options you did not pick at tier 3.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +10%/+15%/+20% Sacred bonus to maximum hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Charisma or Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Reinforced Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improves the Armor Class bonuses you receive from shields or armor. Choose the option you didn't chose at Tier 4.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Armor
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from armor or docents is increased by [15/30/50]%.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reinforced Shield
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Armor Class bonus you gain from using a shield is increased by [15/30/50]%. Note: The Shield bonus does not stack with the bonus from the Unyielding Sentinel Epic Destiny. Note: This stacks with Reinforced Defense from Stalwart Defender.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Harbored by Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +10/15/25 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. You gain 1/2/3 additional uses of Lay on Hands. In addition, while you are actively blocking with a shield, enemies that attack you will take 3d4/4d4/5d4 Light Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Reprisal
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On attacked: your next attack gains +1 damage. This affect stacks up to 3/6/10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Sacred Defender: Greater Sacred Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Further improves your Sacred Defense stance. Pick the third option left.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hardy Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Strong Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +[2/4/6] Sacred bonus to Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Tenacious Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: Sacred Defence: While wearing medium or heavy armor or wielding a shield you gain a +10%/+15%/+20% Sacred bonus to maximum hit points.
